dependencies.description:
execnet provides a share-nothing model with channel-send/receive
communication for distributing execution across many Python interpreters
across version, platform and network barriers.
dependencies.name: py-execnet

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.
dependencies.name: py-pytest

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: pytest plugin for efficiently checking PEP8 compliance
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-pep8

description:
pytest plugin to provide cross-test run caching functionality to plugins
and test runs.
name: py-pytest-cache

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
